events.message: The customer reported a collision between their vehicle and another car on Main Street, resulting in visible damage to the front bumper.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under 'Auto Accident' based on the description of the vehicle collision provided in the report.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the accident claim and will act as the primary contact for updates and inquiries.
The claim has been officially acknowledged by our system, and the customer was notified of receipt and next steps.
Requested the customer submit photos of the vehicle damage, a police report, and their driver’s license for claim processing.
The customer submitted all requested documents, including images of the damaged vehicle and official police accident report.
Investigation into the circumstances of the auto accident commenced with a review of documents and contact with witnesses.
Investigation concluded confirming the fault of the other driver and assessment of damages for repair costs was completed.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering the repair expenses and rental car reimbursement.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the timely communication.
The claim was officially approved by the insurance team based on the completed investigation and customer agreement.
Payment for the approved settlement was issued to the customer’s account to cover auto repair and associated costs.
The auto accident claim was formally closed after successful payout and confirmation from the customer that repairs were scheduled.
All documentation and records related to the vehicle accident claim have been archived for future reference.
